agent_utterance: Now: have a small, pre-portioned snack (about 150–200 kcal) and log it. Options: 1/2 cup plain yogurt with a handful of berries, or apple slices with a tablespoon of peanut butter. Drink a glass of water with it. If you’re eating later, plan a lean option (grilled chicken/tofu with veggies) and log afterward. Keep it simple to stay near your daily target.

agent_utterance: Great plan. Before you snack, pause for 60 seconds to check your cravings: take 3 slow breaths, name the urge, and rate its intensity from 0 to 10. Ask yourself, Am I truly hungry, or is this about stress, heat, or habit? If you’re not hungry, choose a nonfood coping option (sip water, stretch, or a quick walk) or postpone. If you are hungry, stick with the 1/2 cup plain yogurt with berries and log it, and plan a lean option later if still hungry. Stay hydrated today in the heat of Suwon.
